title: Example A
text: Pittsburgh is a city in Pennsylvania. It is known for bridges, rivers, and universities like Carnegie Mellon University. This is a short synthetic paragraph for testing the chunking pipeline.

title: Example B
text: Carnegie Mellon University (CMU) is a private research university in Pittsburgh. This synthetic text is used only for integration tests. It contains multiple sentences so that chunking can produce at least one chunk.

title: Example C
text: This is a third synthetic document. It exists to ensure the pipeline handles multiple documents and writes output artifacts correctly. The content is intentionally generic and safe for testing.
